title: Introduction To web Development
dis: Discover web development and learn to build your own interactive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Supported by Google.

title: Using Javascript, jQuery,and json in Django
dis: Understand how to use JavaScript, jQuery and JSON within the Django framework.

title: Programming Application With Python
dis: On the final course of this ExpertTrack, consider applications for APIs and Python, and explore the purpose of web scraping.
